title: Agent Profile Loading Systems Functioning Correctly
description: Both AgentProfileLoader and FrameworkAgentLoader systems are fully functional with proper three-tier hierarchy support. These systems provide reliable agent instruction loading as fallback when Python agent loading fails.

working_systems: AgentProfileLoader: three-tier hierarchy with markdown parsing
FrameworkAgentLoader: system/user/project precedence with profile instruction generation
AgentDiscoveryService: real-time file monitoring and health checks

architectural_benefits: Provides reliable fallback when Python agent loading fails
Enables dynamic agent instruction loading without code changes
Supports hierarchical customization across project/user/system tiers
Integrates with Task Tool for subprocess context enhancement
operational_status: Systems are production-ready and actively providing agent instruction loading functionality
